Detailed Description

cvmx_spx::_int_sync

SPX_INT_SYNC - Interrupt Sync Register

Notes: This mask set indicates which exception condition should cause the SPX_INT_REG[SPF] bit to assert

It is recommended that software set the PRTNXA, SPIOVR, CLSERR, DRWNNG, DIPERR, CALERR, and SYNCERR errors as synchronization events. Software is free to synchronize the bus on other conditions, but this is the minimum recommended set.
